meanings.definition: A type of spore produced by rust fungi.
meanings.sent1: The uredospore helps rust fungi spread to other plants.
meanings.sent2: Farmers need to watch out for uredospores on their crops.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous uredospore played hide and seek with the other spores.
meanings.sent4: Like tiny messengers, uredospores carried the rust fungi far and wide.
meanings.sent5: Under the microscope, the uredospore looked like a tiny, dusty star.

meanings.definition: A reproductive structure of certain plant pathogens.
meanings.sent1: The scientist studied the uredospore under a powerful microscope.
meanings.sent2: The plant disease spread quickly due to the release of uredospores.
meanings.sent3: The uredospore threw a party and invited all the other plant pathogens.
meanings.sent4: In the battle against plant diseases, the uredospore was the secret weapon.
meanings.sent5: The garden was under attack by an army of uredospores, marching relentlessly.
